name: Arkar Chan Myae Ko
title: Web and Mobile App Developer
about_me: I'm a passionate full-stack web and mobile app developer with a strong focus on creating dynamic websites and seamless mobile experiences. I thrive on solving complex problems and building solutions that enhance user experiences.

Currently, I'm a Senior Associate Engineer at Pro Empire where I work on a cross-border e-commerce platform. My work involves developing the Seller Centre for shop management, a Delivery Management System for logistics operations, and a Customer Mobile App to provide a smooth shopping experience.
I'm also working as a part-time Senior Associate Engineer at Klonotech, building and deploying a church management system that includes an admin web app and a mobile app for church planters.
Previously, as a Junior Developer at Klonotech, I was involved in developing web applications, including a CMS, School Management System, and Hotel Management System.

description: Developed and maintained high quality e-commerce platform
Reviewed the code and resolved the conflicts to ensure smooth development
Implemented Docker containerization to streamline and optimized deployments
Manage cloud hosting environments for scalable and efficient deployments
Developed church management platform using Nuxtjs and Laravel
Developed mobile app for church planter using Nuxtjs with Capacitor
Implemented Google Maps API with drag-and-drop functionality for managing church locations
Integrated Firebase Cloud Messaging to deliver real-time push notifications on both web and mobile
Handled manual deployment and environment configuration for development environments
Designed and developed a cross-border e-commerce mobile application using Flutter, Go, Keycloak and PostgreSQL
Designed the seller centre web application using Figma and developed with Nextjs, Graphql, Go, Keycloak and PostgresQL
Designed and developed hotel management system using Vuejs, Laravel and MySQL
Designed and developed school management system client using Vuejs
Built CMS public website and admin panel client using Vuejs
